title: Satwiksairaj-Chirag Win Silver At French Open Badminton Tournament
text:
Indian duo of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty put up a brave fight but could only finish second best as they settled for a silver at the French Open Super 750.

AFP

The pair of Satwik-Chirag had been punching above their weight and impressing throughout the tournament and also becoming the first Indian men's doubles pair to reach a World Tour 750 final.

After storming into the summit clash, the Indian pair faced an uphill task against number one seeds Marcus Fernaldi Gideon and Kevin Sanjaya Sukamuljo of Indonesia, and it was a step too steep for the Indian pair as they feel short, losing 18-21 16-21.

PTI

Don't Miss 8.4 K SHARES 13 K SHARES 4.3 K SHARES 4 K SHARES 1.5 K SHARES

Satwik and Chirag looked rusty in the match and didn't have a good start as the world no 1 Indonesian pair moved to a huge 7-1 lead.

The Indian duo showed the stomach to fight, clawing their way back at 17-17 with some clever play from Satwik and equally supported by Chirag. But the number uno pair showed why they are the best in the world as quick-fire smashes helped them take the first set.

AFP

In the second set, the opening exchanges were equally impressive from both sides, but Gideon and Sukamuljo, soon found another gear as they closed the match in two sets to win the French Open title.

The World No. 11 Indian pair had an impressive week as they shocked reigning world champions Mohammad Ahsan and Hendra Setiawan, before scripting stunning wins over World No. 8 Kim Astrup and Anders Skaarup Rasmussen and World No. 6 Hiroyuki Endo and Yuta Watanabe.

(With Inputs From PTI)
description: Indian duo of Satwiksairaj Rankireddy and Chirag Shetty put up a brave fight but could only finish second best as they settled for a silver at the French Open Super 750. The pair of Satwik-Chirag had been punching above their weight and impressing throughout the tournament and also becoming the first Indian men's doubles pair to reach a World Tour 750 final.
